translation.title: Hi, I'm
translation.subtitle: I develop user Interfaces, web and aplications
translation.introductionText: I'm a skilled software developer with experience in JavaScript, and expertise in frameworks like React, Node.js, and Three.js, i18N, etc... I'm a quick learner and collaborate closely with clients to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!
translation.jobs: WHAT I HAVE DONE SO FAR

experiences.title: Full stack Engineer
point: Developing web and mobile applications using ReactJS and React Native and other related technologies.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, and other developers to create high-quality product.
Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.

experiences.title: React.js Developer
points: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and other related technologies.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality product.
Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.

experiences.title: Freelancer
points: I developed a custom website for an exceptional accounting firm, Pinheiro Contabilidade
Using modern technologies such as ReactJS and Styled-Components, integrated with an API specialized in providing updated monthly newsletters about the world of accounting.
